original_title: River of Rage: The Taking of Maggie Keene
overview: A white water rafting vacation turns into a nightmare when divorced mother Maggie Keene must confront the deadly and charismatic killer who is stalking her. The hunt is on, and Maggie's desperation to stay alive proves to be a worthy match for her killer, the river, and the dangerous elements she is forced to survive.
title: River of Rage: The Taking of Maggie Keene
